locations.name: Paris
locations.description: The starting point of the tour, known as the City of Love, featuring iconic landmarks like the Eiffel Tower, Louvre, and Montmartre.

locations.name: Cannes
locations.description: Indicated as a likely base on the French Riviera ('Base yourselves near the heart of the Riviera, perhaps exploring... Cannes'). Famous for its film festival and the Croisette, serving as a hub for exploring nearby Antibes, Saint-Paul de Vence, and Monaco.
